hero.title: Unleash Your Creativity with HeroPrompt
hero.description: Experience the next evolution in AI image generation. Powered by the advanced Nano Banana 2 and Gemini 3 Pro Image models, turn your imagination into reality in seconds.

introduce.title: What is HeroPrompt?
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: HeroPrompt is a state-of-the-art AI image generator that leverages the power of Nano Banana 2 to deliver hyper-realistic and artistic visuals.

items.title: Nano Banana 2 Engine
items.description: Our proprietary model designed for exceptional prompt adherence and creativity.

items.title: Gemini 3 Pro Integration
items.description: Seamlessly integrated with Gemini 3 Pro for unmatched photorealism.

items.title: Instant Generation
items.description: Generate high-quality 4K images in seconds with our optimized infrastructure.

items.title: Advanced Control
items.description: Fine-tune your creations with precision control over style, aspect ratio, and composition.

benefits.title: Why Choose HeroPrompt
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Unlock the full potential of AI art with features designed for professionals and enthusiasts alike.

items.title: Superior Image Quality
items.description: HeroPrompt delivers industry-leading image fidelity, perfect for print and digital media.

items.title: Unlimited Styles
items.description: From anime and oil painting to photorealism and 3D render, explore endless artistic styles.

items.title: Commercial Rights
items.description: You own the images you create. Use them for commercial projects without royalties.

usage.title: Create in 3 Simple Steps
usage.description: Turn your ideas into visual masterpieces with ease:

items.title: Enter Your Prompt
items.description: Describe what you want to see in detail. The better the description, the better the result.

items.title: Customize Settings
items.description: Choose your preferred model (Nano Banana 2 or Gemini 3 Pro), style, and aspect ratio.

items.title: Generate & Download
items.description: Hit generate and watch your image appear in seconds. Download in high resolution.

items.title: Refine & Upscale
items.description: Use our built-in tools to upscale, vary, or edit your generated images.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Everything you need for professional AI image generation.

items.title: Text to Image
items.description: Convert your words into stunning visuals with our advanced natural language understanding.

items.title: Image to Image
items.description: Use an existing image as a reference to generate new variations and styles.

items.title: Inpainting
items.description: Edit specific parts of your image by masking and describing changes.

items.title: High-Res Upscaling
items.description: Upscale your images to 4K and beyond without losing quality.

items.title: Style Mixing
items.description: Blend multiple styles to create unique and personalized aesthetics.

items.title: Prompt Enhancer
items.description: Let our AI optimize your prompts for the best possible results.

stats.description: Join the fastest growing community of AI artists.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team

items.question: What is HeroPrompt?
items.answer: HeroPrompt is an advanced AI platform that allows you to generate high-quality images from text descriptions using state-of-the-art models like Nano Banana 2 and Gemini 3 Pro.

items.question: Can I use the images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! All images generated with our paid plans come with full commercial rights, so you can use them for your projects, products, and marketing.

items.question: How does the credit system work?
items.answer: Each generation costs a certain number of credits depending on the model and settings used. You get a monthly allowance with your subscription, and you can buy top-ups if needed.

items.question: What makes Nano Banana 2 different?
items.answer: Nano Banana 2 is optimized for creative flexibility and prompt adherence, allowing for more stylized and artistic results compared to standard models.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free tier with daily credits so you can try out HeroPrompt and see the magic for yourself before subscribing.

items.question: Can I upload my own images?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can use our Image-to-Image feature to use your own photos as a reference for the AI to generate new variations.

cta.title: Start Creating Today

metadata.title: HeroPrompt - AI Prompt Management & Reader
metadata.description: Efficiently edit, customize and read AI prompts with HeroPrompt. Powerful prompt management tool with variable support and easy reading interface.
metadata.keywords: AI prompt editor, prompt management, read prompts, prompt customization, variable editor, HeroPrompt

brand.title: HeroPrompt
brand.description: HeroPrompt is the ultimate AI image generation platform for creators, designers, and visionaries.
